A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Where to start with this movie...the biggest and most obvious being the SJW identity politics that ruined any potential character/plot development that could have occurred. Honestly I liked Force Awakens and Rogue One but this trash fire of a movie is just as ridiculous and persevere as the SJW ideology itself. The characters that started the reboot (albeit generic) that could have been we will never know what they could have been nor the depth that made them people they are will never be known because of a handful of  people's political agendas. The plot of the movie really doesn't matter because nothing really happens despite the fact that the movie is the longest in the franchise's history.
